text:
Attended church service near kindergarden

Kim Keat christian church
11  Beng Wan Road attended church mandarin service.

The Sermon
Jesus is the brightest light in the world.. He also want us to be light & salt in the world

Best kindergarten with extra curricular activities guided by superb energetic Principal. " Better than a thousand day of diligent study is one day with the great teacher."KKCC has professional teachers and the efforts put by them for moulding the kids are very much appreciated.

We have a great transformation story for our kid, who is enjoying the school daily. Appreciate the teacherâ€™s who are helping the kids. Good Education is not always Academic. The only Kindergarten to conduct sports day.
Pray the sisterinchrist and brother in christ will be more welcoming to outsiders and loving like Jesus do. The fruit of the spirit.
